Aniekan Udofia (a mụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye na-ese ihe osise nke a maara maka nnukwu eserese ya na ihe osise ya na mpaghara Washington, DC. Ọrụ nka ya nke obodo ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ na-asọpụrụ onye America a ma ama bụ Duke Ellington. Udofia nwetara nlebara anya mba ya na ihe osise mkpa ọchị ya na ihe osise foto maka mbipụta dịka XXL, Vibe, DC Pulse, na The Source
Ọrụ Udofia ndị ọzọ a ma ama bụ nnukwu ihe osise nke Fredrick Douglass na George Washington
A makwaara ya nke ọma site na eserese ndụ ya na otu ya na ihe omume dị iche iche na Washington, nke ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Red Bull, Heineken, Honda, Current TV, Timberland na Adidas na-akwado

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, Udofia na ọrụ ya gosipụtara ihe ngosi Visual Collaborative pop-up nke a na-akpọ Visual Grandeur Udofia ghọrọ aha ezinụlọ na ihe nkiri hip-hop site na ịmepụta uwe egwuregwu maka ụlọ ọrụ dị ka AND1 na Native Tongue
Udofia's ''The Village B-Boy'' bụ ihe ngosi akara ahịa
Ọ bụ nchịkọta ihe karịrị ihe oyiyi iri abụọ
Ihe oyiyi ndị ahụ na-egosipụta ike na obi ụtọ nke nnukwu mbupụ egwu na United States mgbe jazz gasịrị
Udofia gosipụtara njide nke ọdịbendị pop nke ọdịda anyanwụ site n'aka Africa na nchịkọta a, jiri nkà na-eji graphite, akara eserese, acrylic, fesa eserese na stencils.
